Class TabSpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • TabSpace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Checkable

    public class TabSpace
extends java.lang.Object
implements Checkable

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TabSpace() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void askForOptions(Options o, java.util.Scanner scan)
      Prompts user for inputs to put into the Options Object and scans the input.
      boolean check(java.lang.String input, Options o)
      Method that checks a string for pre-line spacing, returning true if the string contains pre-line spacing divisible by the amount of spaces specified when constructing the TabSpace object and false if the tabs (indents) are proper.
      java.lang.String error(int line)
      Method that simply returns the proper error message for a line containing improper spacing before the the code.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public TabSpace()

    • Method Detail

      • askForOptions

        public void askForOptions(Options o,
                 java.util.Scanner scan)
        Prompts user for inputs to put into the Options Object and scans the input. If the input is incorrect, it will reprompt for input.
        Specified by:
        askForOptions in interface Checkable
        Parameters:
        o - The option input from the Scanner.
        scan - The scanner for the option input.

      • check

        public boolean check(java.lang.String input,
            Options o)
        Method that checks a string for pre-line spacing, returning true if the string contains pre-line spacing divisible by the amount of spaces specified when constructing the TabSpace object and false if the tabs (indents) are proper.
        Specified by:
        check in interface Checkable
        Parameters:
        input - The string the method is checking.
        o - The options object that has the information on the check.
        Returns:
        True if the string contains correct tabspacing and false if not.

      • error

        public java.lang.String error(int line)
        Method that simply returns the proper error message for a line containing improper spacing before the the code.
        Specified by:
        error in interface Checkable
        Parameters:
        line - The line number that the error occured
        Returns:
        The error message.
